summary: An eccentric but faithful mafia, Chi-sung is sent to prison for his part in a gang fight. But when his parents are attacked by a rival mob and his own people take no action, he realizes ... See full summary »
cast: Jae-yeong Jeong|Jun-ho Jeong|Seung-ryong Ryu|Won-tae Choi|Jeong Gyu-Su|Jin Jang|Jin-mo Joo|Il-Woong Kim|Il-wung Kim|Kyu-chul Kim|Ho-seok Kong|Han-wi Lee|Jeong Lee|Ji-yong Lee|Moon-su Lee|Ji-hwan Min|Jung-gi Park|Goo Shin|Jang Young-Nam|Yu-seon Yun
title: Geo-rook-han-ge-bo
